post_text: Parents, this is not simply a computer screen in the goggles. Think of the movie "Tron" from the 1980s. It's finally here! You're in the computer.
shared_text:
Lobaki
May 26, 2019 at 7:22 PM ·

We feel very fortunate to be part of such an exciting time of acceleration for the power of virtual reality to enrich and transform lives!

Our friends at the TK Martin Center for Technology and Disability are exploring the new Oculus Quest with us at Lobaki to see what innovations we can unlock for the people that they serve.

Come experience the Oculus Quest for yourself and see how Lobaki can work with you and your organization to create new opportunities through virtual reality development!

Schedule to visit the Lobaki XR Lab: https://www.lobaki.com/contact
text:
Parents, this is not simply a computer screen in the goggles. Think of the movie "Tron" from the 1980s. It's finally here! You're in the computer.

Lobaki
May 26, 2019 at 7:22 PM ·

We feel very fortunate to be part of such an exciting time of acceleration for the power of virtual reality to enrich and transform lives!

Our friends at the TK Martin Center for Technology and Disability are exploring the new Oculus Quest with us at Lobaki to see what innovations we can unlock for the people that they serve.

Come experience the Oculus Quest for yourself and see how Lobaki can work with you and your organization to create new opportunities through virtual reality development!

Schedule to visit the Lobaki XR Lab: https://www.lobaki.com/contact

post_text:
Parents, a little teaser.... stay tuned!!

https://www.facebook.com/LobakiXR/videos/1412854402203510/
shared_text:
Lobaki is feeling delighted.
September 7, 2019 at 8:42 PM ·

This week, we had a blast helping 44 innovative educators experience Beat Saber in Oculus Quests at Yazoo County Schools!

Lobaki is excited for several new partnerships with school leadership across the nation that are investing in the future of education through the use of virtual reality.

If you’re an educator or an innovator then we’d love for you to join us at an open house event to celebrate Lobaki’s new headquarters in downtown Jackson, MS!

Link to open house reg: https://lobakiopenhouse.eventbrite.com/?ref=estw

post_text:
Hey everyone, let’s have some schoolwide fun!

Spirit Week!

Monday 3/30
Super Hero Day – In honor of hospital workers, first responders, grocery employees and all other essential personnel.

Tuesday 3/31
Crazy Hair/School Spirit Wear – In honor of our hair stylists and barbers and the schools we miss.

Wednesday 4/1
Dress Like an Old Person – In honor of the generation that is most at risk.

Thursday 4/2
Jersey Day – In honor of our favorite sports teams that are not currently able to play.

Friday 4/3
Pajama Day – Because…let’s face it, pajamas are the best part of virtual learning!

**Students, staff, and parents are encouraged to post pictures on the Eastside STREAM Facebook page each day as you participate in ESA Spirit Week**

Thank You!
text:
Hey everyone, let’s have some schoolwide fun!

Spirit Week!

Monday 3/30
Super Hero Day – In honor of hospital workers, first responders, grocery employees and all other essential personnel.

Tuesday 3/31
Crazy Hair/School Spirit Wear – In honor of our hair stylists and barbers and the schools we miss.

Wednesday 4/1
Dress Like an Old Person – In honor of the generation that is most at risk.

Thursday 4/2
Jersey Day – In honor of our favorite sports teams that are not currently able to play.

Friday 4/3
Pajama Day – Because…let’s face it, pajamas are the best part of virtual learning!

**Students, staff, and parents are encouraged to post pictures on the Eastside STREAM Facebook page each day as you participate in ESA Spirit Week**

Thank You!

Parents, with all of the uncertainty in education, it's time to make a great decision for next year. Click on the link below to receive more information about our Academy. We offer..

- Caring staff
- Small class sizes
- Safe learning environment
- Common core state standards
- STREAM (Science Technology, Reading, Engineering, the Arts & Math)
- Performing Arts (dance, music)
- Technology classes 
- Robotics 
- Spanish classes 
- Transportation (cluster stops) 
- EOG Enrichment Tutoring 
- Breakfast & Lunch 
- Cultural diversity 
- Before & After School programs
- Volunteer opportunities 
- Athletics to include basketball and more! 
- Clubs (Girls on the run, reading and writing, debate) 

And so much more! Click on the link below...
https://mthrockmor.wufoo.com/forms/zkzs17c1hthpo3/

Learning and innovation must work together in an educational setting that faces greater challenges and demands than ever before. The teaching methods employed are proven, interactive and founded on the most essential but often overlooked ingredient of all: Love.

post_text:
Eastside Stream Academy sets an atmosphere for vibrant and innovative learning for ALL of our SCHOLARS. We are committed to EXCELLENCE and making a DIFFERENCE- One child at a time.

Our authentic curriculum focus, throughout our K-8 program, specifically addresses the needs of our scholars as they matriculate through our institution of learning. Our Instructional Facilitators are equipped with the necessary tools to ensure that learning is occurring throughout all grade spans.

As the North Carolina Common Core State Standards as our road map, we are able to manipulate and extrapolate the curriculum to meet the needs of our scholars- physically, emotionally, socially and academically- thus promoting a sense of self-worth and responsible citizenship.

#Education #Charlotte #School #Charterschool #Excellence
